creator: ohauer@gmx.de
text:
Created attachment 32422
remove SSLv2 support from mod_ssl

httpd-2.2.x still supports SSLv2, isn't it time to remove SSLv2 support from mod_ssl?

I've taken the liberty to backport SSLv2 related mod_ssl changes from 2.4.x to 2.2.x.

If required I will also try to fix the documentation.
